Module app.supernaut.fx
Package app.supernaut.fx.internal

Class DefaultFxMainView

java.lang.Object
app.supernaut.fx.internal.DefaultFxMainView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ForegroundApp.SupernautMainView, ForegroundApp.SupernautView, FxForegroundApp.FxMainView
@Deprecated public final class DefaultFxMainView extends Object implements FxForegroundApp.FxMainView
Deprecated.
Default, Internal implementation of FxForegroundApp.FxMainView. Simply wraps a primary Stage. TODO: For extra credit create a macOS-friendly implementation of FxMainView with an invisible primaryStage
